com.ajaxjs.net.ftp.sun

类 TransferProtocolClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ajaxjs.net.ftp.sun.NetworkClient
      • com.ajaxjs.net.ftp.sun.TransferProtocolClient
  • 直接已知子类:
    FtpClient

    public class TransferProtocolClient
extends NetworkClient
    This class implements that basic intefaces of transfer protocols. It is used by subclasses implementing specific protocols.
    另请参阅:
    FtpClient
